REUTERS.UNKNOWN: A RM f0990 reute b f BC-/CHEMICAL-<CHL>-RAISE 04-01 0038

TEXT.TITLE: CHEMICAL <CHL> RAISES PRIME RATE TO 7-3/4 PCT
TEXT.BODY: Chemical Bank, the main bank subsidiary of Chemical New York Corp, said it is raising its prime lending rate to 7-3/4 pct from 7-1/2 pct, effective immediately. Reuter
